text:
Dakota City is a city in Dakota County, Nebraska, United States. As of the 2010 census, 1,919 people lived there. It is the county seat of Dakota County.
History.
Dakota City was platted in 1856. It was named for the Dakota people. Dakota City was incorporated as a city in 1858.
Geography.
Dakota City is at (42.415294, -96.417808).
According to the United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. Of that, is land and is water.
Demographics.
Dakota City is part of the Sioux City, IA–NE–SD Metropolitan Statistical Area.
2010 census.
As of the 2010 census says that there were 1,919 people, 637 households, and 464 families living in Dakota City.
